text: Abayahudi baboola mbu Abakristo babula shiosi shiosi shiahabwene shokhwemakhwo, ne Abaktristo boosi nibaboola mbu Abayahudi babula shiosishiosi shiahabwene, shiokhwemakhwo nabo basomanga eshitabu, ne endio nilwababoola abakorwa amakhuwa kafwanana nende akaabu, kho Nyasaye alibakabukhasia inyanga yeyindukho khukabawukhanilanga
